puzzle_text: The quiz was first published in 1962. We will change the original version slightly in the descriptions leaving the meaning as it is. A parrot owner lives next to the Mars eater. 11. A man eating Snickers lives next to a man loving hamsters. 12. A man loving Kitkat and a man loving strawberries are the same person. 13.
